verbose_text: Robust PPE policies [XREF_BIBR] should also be in place for healthcare workers and strictly adhered to, to prevent nosocomial transmission of COVID-19 when managing COVID-19 positive cases, patients under investigation (PUI) and non-COVID-19 cases, even as the number of cases decline.
evidence: PPE policies [ XREF_BIBR ] should also be in place for healthcare workers and strictly adhered to, to prevent nosocomial transmission of COVID-19
